position.description: The position this adornment should appear relative to the Input.
position.description_zh: 此装饰相对于输入的位置应显示。

children.description: The content of the component, normally an IconButton or string.
children.description_zh: 组件的内容，通常为 IconButton 或字符串。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

disablePointerEvents.description: Disable pointer events on the root. This allows for the content of the adornment to focus the input on click.
disablePointerEvents.description_zh: 在根目录上禁用指针事件。这允许装饰的内容将输入集中在单击上。

disableTypography.description: If children is a string then disable wrapping in a Typography component.
disableTypography.description_zh: 如果 children 是字符串，则禁用 Typography 组件中的换行。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

variant.description: The variant to use. Note: If you are using the TextField component or the FormControl component you do not have to set this manually.
variant.description_zh: 要使用的变体。注意：如果使用的是 TextField 组件或 FormControl 组件，则不必手动设置此组件。
